Class RobotBase

java.lang.Object
  maze.ai.RobotBase
Direct Known Subclasses:
Floodfill, LeftWallFollower, ModifiedFloodfill, PythonScriptRobot, RightWallFollower, Tremaux
public abstract class RobotBase
extends java.lang.Object

This is the interface for the robot AI that is used by the GUI.

getRobotListModel

public static javax.swing.MutableComboBoxModel getRobotListModel()
Gets a singleton instance of a robot list model. This contains a global list of all the AI algorithms available to the system.

setRobotLocation

public void setRobotLocation(RobotModel model)
Sets the instance of the robot model to use.

initialize

public void initialize()
Called to before any steps are requested of the robot. This can be overridden to do any initialization of the AI.

nextStep

public abstract RobotStep nextStep()
This is called by the controller to get the next move that the robot AI will take.

When the robot is in TURBO mode the controller/GUI has the option of speeding up the animation.
